articles.title: ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ Draws Mixed First Reactions, Some Praising as an ‘Absolute Blast’ and Others Saying It’s ‘Slightly Empty’ - Variety
articles.description: 'Captain America: Brave New World' has been unveiled for the press, and the first reactions toward the comic book tentpole are coming in lukewarm.
articles.content:
